message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this unique product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a competitive price of $1100000. Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I would like to propose a price of $950000 for the product.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob, and I'm glad you see its value. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this deal. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $1150000.

I'm glad we're getting closer, Bob. I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $1300000. I'm willing to make a slight concession, so I'll meet you at $1250000. This is my final offer, so let me know if it works for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1200000.

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'll meet you at $1250000, but this is my last offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to explore other options.
I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually beneficial solution, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $1225000 for the product.

I'm glad we're still in the game, Bob. I'm willing to make one last push to get to a deal. I'll meet you at $1250000, but I need to be honest with you, I'm getting a little concerned that we might not meet in the middle. If that's the case, I'll have to consider other options. Let's see if we can make it work.

I understand your position, Alice. I've done some research and I believe that $1237500 is a fair price for the product considering its value and the market conditions. I hope this proposal aligns with your expectations.
